mapper.insert: insert fl_notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, pdate = now()

mapper.update: update fl_notice set skipNum = skipNum + 1 where noticeID = #{noticeID}
mapper.delete: delete from fl_notice where noticeID in (${ids})
